project.name: C-C459A-FFMP-03-ST02-DT05-DF17-CF01-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a filename to read in the file contents using an fread operation within the function Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C459A-FFMP-03-ST02-DT05-DF17-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Takes an input integer and creates temporary files, filling them with a large string. It then attempts cleanup, but if more than 50 files were created, then only the last 50 will be cleaned up. Given a large enough input the program will use up a significant ammount of disk space creating temporary files and not cleaning them up.

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C459A-FFMP-03-ST02-DT05-DF17-CF01-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Takes an input integer and creates temporary files, filling them with a large string. It then attempts cleanup, but if more than 50 files were created, then only the last 50 will be cleaned up. Given a large enough input the program will use up a significant ammount of disk space creating temporary files and not cleaning them up.

process.script: if [[ $(find /tmp -maxdepth 1 -iname "stonesoup_data_459*" | wc -l) -gt 0 ]]; then echo "TEMP FILES EXIST"; else echo "EMPTY"; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_v7dMk1tXwjZkFtRBof4y AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (tmp_files_exist_LeyhbE76Tw) AND NOT timeout_qT1rOuoJKI) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((tmp_files_exist_LeyhbE76Tw) OR timeout_qT1rOuoJKI)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (tmp_files_exist_LeyhbE76Tw) AND NOT timeout_qT1rOuoJKI) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((tmp_files_exist_LeyhbE76Tw) OR timeout_qT1rOuoJKI))
